SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.mx.assets

Class StsPolicyValidator

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.assets.StsPolicyValidator
public class StsPolicyValidator extends Object
Strict Transport Security Policy Validator.

Parser for MTA-STS HTTPS policy file contents.

Once constructed all data can be retrieved.

Primary scope is to match MX domains against the policy list of MX masks.
